animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I'm known for my love of peanuts.
💦 I use my trunk to drink and bathe.

animal.question: I meow and purr, and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
😴 I spend a lot of time sleeping.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail, and love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I am known as man's best friend.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: ⚫️ I have black and white spots sometimes.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?
I have black and white stripes, and I'm like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🐎 My stripes are unique to each individual.
🦁 Lions are one of my predators.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?
I slither and have no legs, some of us are venomous. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I like to bask in the sun.

animal.question: I build dams and chew on trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I build my home from sticks and mud.

animal.question: I am a nocturnal bird known for my wisdom. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐭 I eat small animals like mice.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to buzz around flowers. What am I?
I hop around and eat plants. I'm often green. Who am I?
I build giant homes with lots of tunnels. I'm a very hard worker. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small, but strong.
👑 Sometimes there is one leader for us all.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and end up with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go through a big change.
🌸 I love to flutter around flowers.

bug.question: I light up the night with a gentle glow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You often see me in the summer evening.
🔥 I'm not actually a fly, but people call me a firefly.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and crawl on the ground. Some people think I'm lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am red with black spots.
🐞 I am considered good luck in some cultures.
🪴 I eat smaller bugs that can harm plants.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 Flies sometimes get stuck on my home.

bug.question: I can walk on water and have long, skinny legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live near ponds and streams.
🦵 I have really long legs compared to my body.

bug.question: I am known for my loud singing in the summertime. I live underground for many years. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Only the males do the singing.
📅 Some of my species emerge every 17 years.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, looking just like a twig or a leaf. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I blend in with my environment.
🌳 I pretend to be part of the plants around me to avoid predators.
